title: After game patching problems
body: I just got out of an urf game, when my client decided to say "We're having trouble patching League of Legends, so we back up your client to a previous version" or something along those lines.  Any who, now its just an endless cycle of Backing up to previous versions and "We cant patch your league of legends client, backing up, restart now". Can someone tell me a fix

replies.body: Yea it seems like just about everyone was affected by this strange patcher loop. I've been told the problem was isolated and solved by now, but hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you still can't get logged in!
